name: Five Nights at the Krusty Krab
summary:
Mr Krabs has opened a brand new Krusty Krab in the city, staffed completely by animatronic versions of his old employees (because it was cheaper than paying their salarys). You are hired as the night watchman at this new restraunt, however strange things begin to happen as the lights go out, and you find yourself in a greater danger than you had expected...

This game is a fan creation and is not affiliated with Scott Cawthon or Nickelodeon. Almost all characters that will appear in this game are owned by Nickelodeon and no copyright infringement is intended.
